alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 18 at 7:30AM CDT until June 18 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 332 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS ASHLEY CHICOT IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST CARROLL FRANKLIN MADISON MOREHOUSE RICHLAND TENSAS WEST CARROLL IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 28 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA COPIAH HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON SMITH YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CLARKE JASPER KEMPER LAUDERDALE NESHOBA NEWTON NOXUBEE WINSTON IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI WASHINGTON IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI CLAIBORNE IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANGUILLA, BASTROP, BAY SPRINGS, BELZONI, BRANDON, BROOKSVILLE, CANTON, CARTHAGE, COLUMBUS, CONEHATTA, CROSSETT, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DE KALB, DECATUR, DELHI, DERMOTT, DURANT, EPPS, EUDORA, FOREST, GOODMAN, GREENVILLE, HAMBURG, HAZLEHURST, HEIDELBERG, ISOLA, JACKSON, KOSCIUSKO, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LAKE VILLAGE, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MAGEE, MAYERSVILLE, MENDENHALL, MERIDIAN, MORTON, NEWELLTON, NEWTON, NORTH CROSSETT, OAK GROVE, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, QUITMAN, RALEIGH, RAYVILLE, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, SCOOBA, SHUBUTA, ST. JOSEPH, STARKVILLE, STONEWALL, TALLULAH, TAYLORSVILLE, TCHULA, UNION, VICKSBURG, WATERPROOF, WESSON, WEST CROSSETT, WEST POINT, WINNSBORO, AND YAZOO CITY.
